Description: THE SOBOBA BAND OF LUISEO INDIANS WILL BE EMBARKING ON A CLIMATE SMART FOOD SOVEREIGNTY AND NUTRITION SECURITY PROJECT FOR THE SOBOBA NATION  THE ANCHOR OF THE PROJECT WILL BE AN INDOOR GROWING FACILITY THAT WILL BE LOCATED ON THE SOBOBA RESERVATION AND WILL BEGIN WITH 10 DESIGNATED ACRES  THISGRANT APPLICATION IS PURSUANT TO FUNDING FOR A FEASIBILITY STUDY FOR THIS PROJECT

THE RESIGHINI RANCHERIA IS REQUESTING  57,187 TO COMPLETE A FEASIBILITY STUDY FOR A GENERAL STORE AND FUELING STATION MARKETPLACE 101 TO PROVIDE FRESH FOOD AND FUEL TO THE COMMUNITY AND TOURISTS TRAVELING HIGHWAY 101 THROUGH KLAMATH, CALIFORNIA  THE PROJECT WAS SELECTED BY THE TRIBAL COUNCIL AS AN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ENDEAVOR INDICATED IN THE TRIBES 2015  2017 COMMUNITY NEEDS ASSESSMENT SURVEY  SEE ATTACHMENT 5  AND IDENTIFIED AS A MID RANGE ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT PROJECT IN PLANNING FOR THE FUTURE, COMPREHENSIVE COMMUNITY AND LAND USE DEVELOPMENT PLAN, SEPTEMBER 2017,  SEE ATTACHMENT 6  MID RANGE ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT   THE PROPOSED ONE YEAR PROJECT WILL EXAMINE AND DETERMINE THE FEASIBILITY OF DEVELOPING A GENERAL GROCERY STORE AND FUEL STATION ON THE RANCHERIA LOCATED AT THE SOUTH END OF KLAMATH  IT IS HOPED TO ALSO SERVE AS A TRAVEL CENTER WITH AN INFORMATIONAL KIOSK TO INCLUDE HISTORY, LOCAL ATTRACTIONS, BROCHURES, AND MAPS  THIS ECONOMIC ENDEAVOR WOULD COMPLEMENT THE TRIBES CHERERE CAMPGROUND AND RV PARK OF 70 SITES AS WELL AS BENEFIT LOW INCOME RESIDENTS IN THIS ISOLATED FOOD INSECURE REGION  THE TRIBE PROPOSES TO CONTRACT A CONSULTING FIRM TO EXAMINE THE PROJECTS VIABILITY AND EXAMINE TECHNICAL ELEMENTS OF MARKET DEMOGRAPHICS, REGIONAL COMPETITION, SITE ANALYSIS, VIABILITY, FINANCIAL FEASIBILITY, ECONOMIC BENEFITS, INVESTMENT, AND PROVIDE PRO FORMA FINANCIALS  THE FEASIBILITY STUDY IS NEEDED TO DETERMINE THE APPROPRIATE BUSINESS MODEL, SIZE, LOCATION, VOLUME OF GOODS, AND INVESTMENT NECESSARY TO BE SUCCESSFUL  THE STUDY WILL ADDRESS SIGNIFICANT ECONOMIC FACTORS, LABOR MARKET, EMPLOYMENT, AND OTHER BARRIERS PRESENT IN THIS SMALL LOW INCOME COMMUNITY SUCH AS LOCATION, FLOOD CONCERNS, AND THE CURRENT ECONOMY  IN THE ABSENCE OF A STRONG LOCAL FOOD SUPPLY COUPLED WITH RISING GASOLINE COSTS  WE ESTIMATE THERE IS A REASONABLE OPPORTUNITY TO DEVELOP A VIABLE BUSINESS AND FILL A NEED IN THIS COMMUNITY  THE FIRST STEP IN THIS ECONOMIC VENTURE IS FOR THE COMPLETION OF A FEASIBILITY STUDY TO ASSIST THE TRIBE IN MAKING INFORMED DECISIONS THAT WILL PAVE THE WAY TO ENSURE BUSINESS SUCCESS  WITHOUT THIS FUNDING AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE, THE TRIBE WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO PROGRESS FORWARD WITH THIS ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY

THE PIT RIVER TRIBE RECENTLY COMPLETED A PRELIMINARY FEASIBILITY STUDY WHICH SHOWED THAT SUFFICIENT EXCESS VEGETATIVE MATTER IS AVAILABLE FROM REGIONAL FORESTS WITHIN ITS ANCESTRAL LANDS BOUNDARY FOR A LONG TERM SUPPLY OF FEEDSTOCK TO BIOMASS ENERGY GENERATORS  SEVERAL SUCH GENERATION FACILITIES ARE CURRENTLY IN PLANNING STAGES IN THE TRIBES AREA  THE STUDY IDENTIFIED THE MAJOR OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL NEEDS FOR A TRIBAL FOR PROFIT BUSINESS TO HARVEST THIS BIOMASS FOR SALE TO ENERGY GENERATION FACILITIES  SUCH A BUSINESS WOULD CREATE JOBS FOR TRIBAL MEMBERS AND GENERATE SIGNIFICANT REVENUE FOR THE TRIBE TO DEFRAY THE APPROXIMATELY  3M ANNUAL ENERGY COST TO ITS MEMBERS, ENTERPRISES, DEPARTMENTS, AND ADMINISTRATION BUILDINGS  MOREOVER, THE TRIBE IS LOCATED IN NORTHEASTERN CALIFORNIA AND SUFFERS FROM A HIGH RISK OF WILDFIRES  THE BIOMASS HARVEST BUSINESS WOULD HELP REDUCE VEGETATIVE FUEL FOR THESE FIRES AND SIGNIFICANTLY LESSEN THE DAMAGE CAUSED BY SUCH FIRES  THE TRIBE REQUESTS BIA NABDI GRANT FUNDS TO CONDUCT A DETAILED TECHNICAL AND FINANCIAL FEASIBILITY STUDY TO SUPPORT A DECISION ON FORMING THIS BUSINESS

THE MUSCOGEE  CREEK  NATION  MCN  OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY OF THE NATION IS APPLYING FOR THE NATIVE AMERICAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE  NABDI  GRANT   MCN IS PLEASED TO SUBMIT THIS APPLICATION FOR THIS GRANT WHICH WILL SUPPORT FURTHER ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT TO HELP SUSTAIN OUR COMMUNITY IN THE FUTURE   THE NATION IS APPLYING TO THE OFFICE OF THE ASSISTANT SECRETARY, INDIAN AFFAIRS, INTERIOR, UNDER THE NATIVE AMERICAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE  NABDI  GRANT, SOLICITATION FOR PROPOSALS FOR FUNDING FROM NABDI FEASIBILITY STUDY PROGRAM  MCN WILL UTILIZE THE FUNDING TO PERFORM A PROJECT MARKET ASSESSMENT AND FEASIBILITY STUDY OF A PARCEL OF LAND LOCATED ALONG HIGHWAY 75 AND PRAIRIE BELL ROAD IN OKMULGEE COUNTY, OKLAHOMA, TO DETERMINE THE VIABLE ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY OF THE DEVELOPMENT OF INDUSTRIAL PARKS, STORAGE, AND CONSTRUCTION AND SHIPPING FACILITIES AT THIS LOCATION THE NATION IS REQUESTING  68,708 IN FEDERAL FUNDING TO CARRY OUT THIS PROJECT WHICH, IF REALIZED, WILL BE USED TO MEET THE CRITICAL NEEDS OF THE COMMUNITY AND PRESENTS AN OPPORTUNITY FOR MCN TO CONTINUE TO ADDRESS THE SUSTAINABILITY OF OUR COMMUNITY THROUGH ECONOMIC DIVERSITY  THIS PROJECT IS IN KEEPING WITH THE NABDI ELIGIBLE PROGRAM ACTIVITIES TO CONDUCT A FEASIBILITY STUDY ON THE VIABILITY OF AN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT PROJECT ENTERPRISE AND WILL NOT DUPLICATE PREVIOUS WORK THE PURPOSE OF THIS PROPOSAL IS TO EVALUATE THE PROJECT MARKET OPPORTUNITIES OF INDUSTRIAL PARKS, STORAGE, AND CONSTRUCTION AND SHIPPING FACILITIES, TO DEVELOP A WELL DEFINED MARKET PROFILE IN THE OKMULGEE COUNTY, OKLAHOMA AREA ON WHICH TO BASE OPERATIONAL DECISIONS TO ASSIST MCN  INCLUDING JOINT VENTURE PARTICIPANT  IN ASSESSING WHETHER THE NATION SHOULD VENTURE INTO THIS MARKET

THE KIOWA TRIBE  KT   A FEDERALLY RECOGNIZED TRIBE WITH TRIBAL HEADQUARTERS IN CARNEGIE, OKLAHOMA   IS SEEKING A GRANT AWARD OF  75,000 THROUGH THE OFFICE OF INDIAN ENERGY AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT  OIED  THROUGH THE NATIVE AMERICAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE  NABDI  OF THE BUREAU OF INDIAN AFFAIRS  BIA , AN AGENCY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR  DOI   THE PURPOSE OF THE GRANT FUNDS IS TO UNDERTAKE A MARKET ANALYSIS AND FEASIBILITY STUDY, IN COLLABORATION WITH AN OUTSIDE FIRM  TO BE IDENTIFIED  TO DETERMINE THE HIGHEST AND BEST USE OF THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY  THE PROPERTY IS APPROXIMATELY 197 35 ACRES AND IS LOCATED 3 5 MILES SOUTHWEST OF ANADARKO, OKLAHOMA  THE KT CURRENTLY HOLDS THE DEED TO THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY, BUT THE BUILDINGS AND PROPERTY HAVE FALLEN INTO A STATE OF DISREPAIR AND WILL NEED TO BE REVITALIZED AND OR REBUILT FOR NEW PURPOSES  THE KT LEADERSHIP HAS IDENTIFIED THE REVITALIZATION OF THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY PROJECT TO BE A HIGH PRIORITY UNDERTAKING AND HAS RECENTLY TAKEN INITIAL STEPS TO KICK OFF THE PROJECT THE OVERALL GOAL OF THE REVITALIZATION OF THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY PROJECT IS TO ESTABLISH AN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ENTERPRISE WHICH WILL HONOR THE KIOWA TRIBE, BRING PRIDE TO OUR CITIZENS AND TO CREATE BENEFITS FOR THE KIOWA TRIBE AND OUR STAKEHOLDERS  MORE, SPECIFICALLY, THE OBJECTIVES OF OUR PROJECT ARE TO ALLOW THE KT 1  TO ESTABLISH AND OPERATE A PROFITABLE TRIBAL ENTERPRISE WHICH CREATES A VALUED ASSET FOR OUR TRIBAL CITIZENS AND GENERATES REVENUE FOR THE KIOWA TRIBE,2  TO DEVELOP EMPLOYMENT AND JOB CREATION OPPORTUNITIES FOR KIOWA TRIBE CITIZENS AND FAMILIES, BOTH DIRECTLY AND INDIRECTLY,3  TO ESTABLISH AND CONTRIBUTE A UNIQUE OFFERING WITHIN THE NATIVE AMERICAN CULTURAL TOURISM LANDSCAPE IN OKLAHOMA, AND4  TO STRENGTHEN, PROMOTE AND SHOWCASE KIOWA TRIBE CULTURAL HERITAGE AND LANGUAGE REVITALIZATION EFFORTS THIS PROPOSAL SPECIFICALLY SEEKS TO SECURE NABDI FUNDS TO ENGAGE AN EXTERNAL CONSULTING FIRM TO UNDERTAKE THE FOLLOWING PROPOSED WORK OBJECTIVES 1  TO COMMUNICATE AND CREATE UNDERSTANDING AMONG THE KIOWA TRIBE CITIZENS OF THE VISION AND AIMS OF THE REVITALIZATION OF THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY PROJECT,2  TO UNDERTAKE A MARKET ANALYSIS OF POSSIBLE ENTERPRISE OFFERINGS WHICH COULD BE INCLUDED WITHIN THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY,3  TO DEVELOP A FEASIBILITY STUDY TO DETERMINE THE HIGHEST AND BEST USE OF THE INDIAN CITY PROPERTY, AND4  TO PARTICIPATE IN THE DOI OIED SPONSORED GRANTEE PROGRAM  AN IN PERSON, 3 DAY MEETING  HELD IN WASHINGTON, DC DURING THE YEAR OF THE GRANT AWARD THE PROPOSED FEASIBILITY STUDY OF THE KIOWA TRIBES INDIAN CITY PROJECT WILL HELP FACILITATE INFORMED DECISION MAKING BY THE KT LEADERSHIP AND CITIZENRY REGARDING THE PLANNING, DESIGN, OPERATION, AND MARKETING OF THE FACILITY TOWARDS THE REALIZATION OF A BRIGHTER ECONOMIC FUTURE FOR THE KT  THE PROPOSED FEASIBILITY STUDY WILL ENSURE A MORE SUCCESSFUL VENTURE WHICH CAN CONTRIBUTE TO ADDRESSING ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT CHALLENGES RESULTING FROM THE COVID 19 PANDEMIC

THE KTO WILL COMPLETE A BUSINESS FEASIBILITY STUDY TO ANALYZE THE VIABILITY OF CREATING A NEW INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY  IT  ENTITY  THE FEASIBILITY STUDY WILL HELP REALIZE THE KTOS ECONOMIC FUTURE AND DISTINGUISH REAL ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITIES FROM INVESTMENTS THAT COULD FAIL  ONCE FEASIBILITY HAS BEEN DETERMINED, BUSINESS PLAN DOCUMENTS INCLUSIVE OF OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL OBJECTIVES WILL LEAD THE TRIBE TO PHASE TWO   IMPLEMENTATION

THE KAIBAB BAND OF PAIUTE INDIANS, IS A FEDERALLY RECOGNIZED TRIBE LOCATED IN THE TOWN OF FREDONIA, ARIZONA IN BOTH COCONINO AND MOHAVE COUNTIES   THE KAIBAB BAND PAIUTE INDIANS TRIBAL COUNCIL PROPOSES TO UTILIZE  59,700 FROM THE OFFICE OF INDIAN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT  OIED   NATIVE AMERICAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE  NABDI  GRANT OPPORTUNITY TO ACQUIRE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO CONDUCT A HIGHEST AND BEST USE ANALYSIS OF A TRIBALLY OWNED 90 ACRE COMMERCIAL SITE LOCATED ALONG SCENIC U S  ROUTE 89A WITH EMPHASIS ON DETERMINING THE VIABILITY OF CONSTRUCTING A PHASE I TRAVEL PLAZA AND FUTURE PHASED COMMERCIAL CORRIDOR  U S  ROUTE 89A IS A PRIMARY TRUCKING AND TOURIST ROUTE IN NORTHERN ARIZONA THE NEED FOR ECONOMIC ACTIVITY ON OUR RESERVATION IS SUBSTANTIAL  CURRENTLY, THE KAIBAB BAND OF PAIUTE INDIANS CONTINUES TO EXPERIENCE HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT AND POVERTY RATES AND IS DEPENDENT UPON FEDERAL FUNDING TO OPERATE PROGRAMS AND SERVICES ON THE RESERVATION  WE DESIRE FINANCIAL FLEXIBILITY AND EVENTUALLY FINANCIAL INDEPENDENCE THROUGH DEVELOPMENT AND EXPANSION OF OUR OWN RESOURCES AND VENTURES  THE DEVELOPMENT OF SUCCESSFUL ECONOMIC VENTURES ON THE RESERVATION, WHETHER OWNED AND OPERATED BY THE TRIBE THROUGH TRIBE OWNED ENTERPRISES OR WHETHER BY INDIVIDUAL TRIBAL MEMBERS OWNING THEIR OWN BUSINESSES, IS CRITICAL TO THE OVERALL VIABILITY OF OUR COMMUNITY   IN ORDER TO FULLY EXPERIENCE OUR SOVEREIGNTY AND INDEPENDENCE, WE MUST ACHIEVE AT LEAST A MODERATE LEVEL OF FINANCIAL SUCCESS AND ECONOMIC ACTIVITY  THE TRAVEL PLAZA FINANCIAL FEASIBILITY STUDY WILL PROVIDE FOR PROFESSIONAL TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO HELP IDENTIFY REQUIRED LEVELS OF DEVELOPMENT CAPITAL INVESTMENT, EQUIPMENT, STAFFING, AND OPERATIONAL NEEDS FOR DEVELOPMENT OF THE PROPOSED ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ENTERPRISE  FUTURE PHASE DEVELOPMENTS INCLUDE AN AUTOMOTIVE MECHANIC SHOP, CULTURAL RETAIL SALES FACILITY, HOTEL AND HOSPITALITY RELATED ENTERPRISES AND POSSIBLY LIGHT MANUFACTURING  THE PHASE I TRAVEL PLAZA WILL CREATE AN ESTIMATED TEN  10  TO FIFTEEN  15  NEW JOBS, AND AN ESTIMATED TWENTY  20  NEW FULL TIME JOBS AS A RESULT OF FUTURE PHASE DEVELOPMENTS    WE ARE PROPOSING A TOTAL FEDERAL FEASIBILITY STUDY AND ANALYSIS PROJECT IN THE AMOUNT OF  59,700  60   PROVIDED BY THE DOI NABDI AND  38,900  40   PROVIDED IN THE FORM OF IN KIND MATCH INCLUDING QUANTIFIED STAFF AND LEADERSHIP TIME, USE OF FACILITIES AND SUPPLIES AND RESOURCES OF THE KAIBAB PAIUTE TRIBE   WE PROPOSE TO SOLICIT BY COMPETITIVE REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL FOR AN INDEPENDENT THIRD PARTY PROFESSIONAL FINANCIAL ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT FIRM   A SUMMARY OF OUR PROPOSED REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS  RFP  IS INCLUDED IN THIS APPLICATION

WITH ITS IOWAY GIS DEVELOPMENT PLAN, THE IOWA TRIBE OF KANSAS AND NEBRASKA  ITKN  SEEKS TO OVERCOME THE INADEQUACIES OF DEMOGRAPHIC RESEARCH IN INDIAN COUNTRY AND EMBARK ON A  NEW AND INNOVATIVE METHOD TO ENGAGE WITH BUSINESS PARTNERS AND OTHER GOVERNMENTS  TO ACCOMPLISH THIS, THE ITKN WILL ENGAGE THE SERVICE OF AN EXPERT GIS CONSULTANT WHO WILL PROVIDE A BUSINESS PLAN FOR ITKN TRIBAL BUSINESSES  GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM  GIS  IS REGULARLY USED IN MANY FACETS OF AGRICULTURE, GOVERNMENT PLANNING, INFRASTRUCTURE MAINTENANCE, AND HAZARD MITIGATION  IT IS A TECHNOLOGY AND BUSINESS SERVICE IDEALLY SUITED TO TRIBAL GOVERNMENTS AND THE ITKN IN PARTICULAR, IN THAT IT IS WELL ALIGNED WITH THE ITKNS PRIORITY ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ACTIVITIES CENTERED AROUND ECONOMIC SOVEREIGNTY, REGENERATIVE NATIVE AGRICULTURE, AND INTER TRIBAL RELATIONSHIP BUILDING

THE DELAWARE NATION ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY  DNEDA , D B A DELAWARE NATION INDUSTRIES  DNI , IS EXPLORING THE POSSIBILITY OF ENTERING THE MEDICAL DEVICE DISTRIBUTION SECTOR WITH ITS NEXT SUBSIDIARY COMPANY   IN THIS STUDY, THE FEASIBILITY STUDY AND  BUSINESS PLAN FOR A DNEDA MEDICAL DEVICE DISTRIBUTION BUSINESS, DNI WISHES TO DETERMINE THE MARKET OPPORTUNITY, UNDERSTAND THE SEGMENTATION WITHIN THE OVERALL MARKET SPACE, AND DETERMINE WHAT BENEFITS MAY BE AVAILABLE TO TRIBALLY OWNED AND TRIBAL 8 A  BUSINESSES   BASED ON THIS INFORMATION, WE INTEND TO DEVELOP AN ACTIONABLE BUSINESS PLAN AND FINANCIAL MODEL THAT CAN BE FOLLOWED TO ESTABLISH A SUCCESSFUL BUSINESS FOR DNI AND THE DELAWARE NATION THAT WILL GENERATE REVENUES AND JOB OPPORTUNITIES

COUSHATTA TRIBE RANCH FEASIBILITY STUDYPROJECT ABSTRACT SUMMARYTHE COUSHATTA TRIBE OF LOUISIANA SEEKS  75,000 TO DETERMINE THE FEASIBILITY AND DEVELOP A MARKET BASED, INVESTOR QUALITY BUSINESS PLAN FOR THE COUSHATTA RANCH, A 40 ACRE PROPERTY LOCATED IN SULPHUR, LA   THE COUSHATTA RANCH OPERATED AS A WORKING RANCH THAT BOARDED AND BRED HORSES, AS WELL AS OFFERED A SERIES OF MODEST CABINS FOR RENT TO TRANSIENT VISITORS   THE PROPERTY EXPERIENCED SIGNIFICANT DAMAGE FROM HURRICANES LAURA  2020  AND IDA  2021  THAT CAUSED THE PROPERTY TO CEASE OPERATIONS   TO DIRECT THE PROPERTYS REDEVELOPMENT AND DETERMINE HOW INSURANCE CLAIM FUNDS ARE INVESTED, A REDEVELOPMENT STRATEGY IS NEEDED   NABDI FUNDS WILL ALLOW THE COUSHATTA TRIBE TO DETERMINE THE HIGHEST AND BEST REDEVELOPMENT FOR COUSHATTA RANCH   THE SCOPE OF WORK IS OUTLINED BELOW GOAL  REDEVELOP THE COUSHATTA TRIBE FARM INTO A PRODUCTIVE ASSET FOR THE TRIBE THAT SERVES AS A HIGHLY DESIRABLE DESTINATION FOR VISITORS, CREATES EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR TRIBAL CITIZENS, AND GENERATES PROFIT THAT IS REINVESTED INTO TRIBAL PROGRAMS AND SERVICES SCOPE OF WORK  THE SCOPE OF WORK CONSIDERS THE FEASIBILITY OF THREE REDEVELOPMENT SCENARIOS, ALL COMPLEMENTARY, THAT CONSIDERS THE ASSETS OF THE PROPERTY, THE CLOSE PROXIMITY TO HOUSTON, AND THE GAPS IN THE MARKET   BELOW OUTLINES THE SCOPE ASSESS CURRENT CONDITION OF THE COUSHATTA RANCH PROPERTY AND FACILITIESIDENTIFY REGIONAL ASSETS THAT SUPPORT THE TOURISM SECTORDEFINE THREE DEVELOPMENT SCENARIOS  REHABILITATION FACILITY  DESTINATION SPA  AND TRADITIONAL HOSPITALITY PROPERTY AND EVENT CENTER  AND CONDUCT HIGH LEVEL, MARKET BASED FEASIBILITY STUDY FOR EACH SCENARIO TO DETERMINE THE HIGHEST AND BEST USE FOR THE PROPERTYDETERMINE THE MOST VIABLE REDEVELOPMENT SCENARIO AND MOVE FORWARD WITH A FULL SCALE FEASIBILITY STUDY, MARKET RESEARCH, PRODUCT DEFINITION, AND OPERATIONS ASSESSMENT CONSTRUCT A SITE PLAN BASED ON THE REDEVELOPMENT SCENARIODEVELOP A MARKET BASED, INVESTOR QUALITY BUSINESS PLAN THAT INCLUDES PRODUCT DEFINITION, MARKETING PLAN, COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS, OPERATIONS PLAN, CAPITAL INVESTMENT PLAN, AND FINANCIAL PRO FORMAS DELIVERABLES  THE FOLLOWING OUTLINES THE DELIVERABLES ASSOCIATED WITH THE COUSHATTA TRIBE RANCH REDEVELOPMENT FEASIBILITY STUDY AND BUSINESS PLAN PROPERTY ASSESSMENTASSET INVENTORYMARKET ANALYSIS FOR EACH REDEVELOPMENT SCENARIOFEASIBILITY STUDY FOR EACH SCENARIOBUSINESS PLAN FOR HIGHEST AND BEST USE REDEVELOPMENT SCENARIOFUND DEVELOPMENT STRATEGY

THE BURNS PAIUTE TRIBE SEEKS TO DETERMINE HOW TO BEST UTILIZE OUR 21 ACRE OLD CAMP PROPERTY TO GAIN MAXIMUM ECONOMIC IMPACT FROM DEVELOPMENT ON THAT SITE   THIS PROPERTY IS LOCATED JUST OFF HIGHWAY 20 ON W MONROE STREET, ON THE EDGE OF BURNS, OREGON  THE CITY OF BURNS IS UNIQUELY POSITIONED AT THE INTERSECTION OF HIGHWAY 20 WHICH RUNS EAST WEST CONNECTING THE OREGON COAST TO BOISE, IDAHO AND HIGHWAY 395 WHICH RUNS NORTH SOUTH CONNECTING WASHINGTON AND CALIFORNIA NEVADA   THE OLD CAMP LOCATION PRESENTS AN OPPORTUNITY FOR OUR TRIBE TO DEVELOP A POWERFUL NEW ECONOMIC ENGINE FOR OUR TRIBE BY BUILDING ONE OR MORE BUSINESSES AT THE SITE   POSSIBILITIES MAY INCLUDE, BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO, EXPANDING OR UPGRADING THE EXISTING RV PARK, CONSTRUCTING A DATACENTER, OPENING A DESTINATION RESTAURANT OR RETAIL LOCATION, OR ESTABLISHING AN INDUSTRIAL OR MANUFACTURING OPERATION   THE PROPOSED NABDI FUNDED STUDY WILL ALLOW US TO HIRE AN EXPERT CONSULTANT TO EVALUATE THE SITE AND PROVIDE RECOMMENDATIONS FOR ITS HIGHEST AND BEST USE, AS WELL AS TO DELIVER AN ACTIONABLE BUSINESS PLAN FOR US TO FOLLOW IN IMPLEMENTING THEIR FINDINGS

THE BAY MILLS INDIAN COMMUNITY  BMIC OR TRIBE  IS INTERESTED IN PERFORMING A FEASIBILITY STUDY TO ASSESS ECONOMIC DIVERSIFICATION OPPORTUNITIES FOR SEPTIC SERVICES  THE PROJECT    A PROJECT OF THIS TYPE HAS NOT BEEN COMPLETED IN THE PAST BEFORE BY BMIC   A TEAM OF KEY STAFF FROM THE BMIC WILL SEEK AND USE CONSULTANT INPUT TO DETERMINE THE POSSIBILITY OF DEVELOPING A SEPTIC TANK PUMPING SERVICE TO INCREASE ECONOMIC DIVERSIFICATION FOR THE BAY MILLS INDIAN COMMUNITY   A CONSULTANT WILL LOOK INTO THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS OPPORTUNITY, FOLLOWED BY TECHNICAL ANALYSES TO ASSESS THE PROJECTS OVERALL FEASIBILITY   SHOULD THE OPPORTUNITY BE DEEMED FEASIBLE THROUGH THE PROJECT, THE FINAL REPORT MAY CONTAIN A ROADMAP FOR THE EXECUTION AND ASSIST IN POSITIONING BMIC TO PURSUE FURTHER FUNDING FOR THE BUSINESS PLAN DEVELOPMENT AND IMPLEMENTATION

THE ALABAMA COUSHATTA TRIBE OF TEXAS  ACTT  PROPOSES THE PLANNING FOR THE ECONOMIC RESILIENCY OF THE ALABAMA COUSHATTA TRIBE OF TEXAS  ACTT  PROJECT AS AN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ASSESSMENT, FEASIBILITY, AND BUSINESS PLANNING PROJECT TO CATALYZE THE TRIBAL ECONOMY, JOB GROWTH, AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP  THE PROJECT WILL INCLUDE THREE DISTINCT PHASES, EACH WITH A DISTINGUISHABLE OBJECTIVE AND DELIVERABLE  ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ASSESSMENT, FEASIBILITY STUDY, AND BUSINESS IMPLEMENTATION PLAN  THE COMPREHENSIVE APPROACH WILL EXPLORE THE ASSETS AND OPPORTUNITIES AVAILABLE TO THE TRIBE AND CULMINATE IN A PLAN TO IMPLEMENT THE MOST FEASIBLE STRATEGIES IDENTIFIED THROUGH THE EXPLORATION PROCESS  THE PROJECT WILL FOCUS THE TRIBES EFFORTS TO BECOME A RESILIENT ECONOMY TO SUSTAIN THE CULTURE AND HERITAGE OF THE PEOPLE OF THE ALABAMA COUSHATTA TRIBE OF TEXAS

CHEROKEE NATION  CN   A FEDERALLY RECOGNIZED TRIBE WITH TRIBAL HEADQUARTERS IN TAHLEQUAH,OKLAHOMA   IS SEEKING A GRANT AWARD OF  75,000 THROUGH THE OFFICE OF INDIAN ENERGY ANDECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT  OIED  THROUGH THE NATIVE AMERICAN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE NABDI  OF THE BUREAU OF INDIAN AFFAIRS  BIA , AN AGENCY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR DOI   THE PURPOSE OF THE GRANT FUNDS IS TO UNDERTAKE A FEASIBILITY STUDY, ALONG WITH THEDEVELOPMENT OF KEY ELEMENTS FOR A BUSINESS PLAN AND MARKETING PLAN, FOR A NEW TRIBAL BUSINESSVENTURE  CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSING  CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSING IS A NEWENTERPRISE FOR CN, FOLLOWING OUR INVESTMENT IN THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A MEAT PROCESSING FACILITYWITHIN THE CN RESERVATION  THE PURPOSE OF THIS GRANT PROPOSAL IS TO SEEK NABDI FUNDING TOUNDERTAKE THE DEVELOPMENT OF A FEASIBILITY STUDY, IN COLLABORATION WITH AN OUTSIDE FIRM,UNAPOLOGETICALLY REZ, LLC, A NATIVE OWNED, WOMEN OWNED AND VETERAN OWNED CONSULTING FIRMWITH OFFICES IN CHEROKEE, NC AND SKIATOOK, OK  CHEROKEE NATION VIEWS THIS ENTERPRISE AS AMECHANISM TO STRENGTHEN OUR OUTREACH OF COMMUNITY SERVICES, IN LIGHT OF SUPPLY CHAINDISRUPTIONS  PARTICULARLY FOR AFFORDABLE FOOD   WHICH AROSE DURING THE COVID 19 PANDEMIC, ANDWHICH HAD A TREMENDOUS NEGATIVE AFFECT ON OUR TRIBAL CITIZENS  THE OVERALL GOAL OF THE CHEROKEENATION MEAT PROCESSING ENTERPRISE IS TO CONTRIBUTE TO OUR EFFORTS TO ADDRESS FOOD INSECURITY AMONGOUR TRIBAL CITIZENS WITHIN OUR TRIBAL RESERVATION  MORE, SPECIFICALLY, THE OBJECTIVES OF THE CHEROKEENATION MEAT PROCESSING PROJECT ARE TO ALLOW THE CN TO   1  OFFER HIGH QUALITY, SAFE FOOD  I E , MEATAND OTHER MEAT PRODUCTS  TO OUR TRIBAL CITIZENS AND TO OTHER DISCERNING RETAIL CONSUMERS,  2  CREATEVIABLE EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR TRIBAL CITIZENS,  3  EXPLORE POSSIBLE VERTICAL INTEGRATIONLINKAGES WITH OTHER CN ENTERPRISES LOCATED WITHIN THE RESERVATION, PARTICULARLY OUR BEEF AND BISONRANCHING OPERATIONS, AND  4  ESTABLISH AND OPERATE AN ENTERPRISE WHICH BRINGS A VALUED SERVICE TOOUR TRIBAL CITIZENS AND GENERATES REVENUE FOR THE CN  THIS PROPOSAL SPECIFICALLY SEEKS TO SECURENABDI FUNDS TO ENGAGE UNAPOLOGETICALLY REZ, LLC  UREZ  TO UNDERTAKE THE FOLLOWING PROPOSEDWORK OBJECTIVES WITH THESE FUNDS   1  TO ANALYZE AND DETERMINE MARKET BASED FOOD PATHWAYSVIABLE FOR PRODUCTS AND SERVICES WHICH CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSING COULD OFFER TO LOCALCONSUMERS, PARTICULARLY OUR TRIBAL CITIZENS,  2  TO UNDERTAKE THE DEVELOPMENT OF A FEASIBILITY STUDYFOR THE RECENTLY DEVELOPED CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSING TRIBAL ENTERPRISE,  3  TO DEVELOP KEYELEMENTS OF A BUSINESS PLAN AND A MARKETING PLAN FOR THE MEAT PROCESSING FACILITY AND RETAILOPERATIONS OF CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSING, AND  4  TO PARTICIPATE IN THE DOI OIEDSPONSOREDGRANTEE PROGRAM  AN IN PERSON, ANNUAL 3 DAY MEETING  TO BE HELD IN WASHINGTON, DCDURING THE YEAR OF THE GRANT AWARD  THE PROPOSED FEASIBILITY STUDY OF THE CHEROKEE NATION MEATPROCESSING PROJECT WILL HELP FACILITATE INFORMED DECISION MAKING BY CN REGARDING THE OPERATIONOF THE FACILITY AND MARKETING OF ITS MEAT AND MEAT PRODUCTS TOWARD THE REALIZATION OF AN ECONOMICFUTURE THAT ALSO ACHIEVES TRIBAL FOOD SECURITY GOALS  THE CHEROKEE NATION MEAT PROCESSINGFEASIBILITY STUDY WILL ENSURE A MORE SUCCESSFUL VENTURE WHICH CAN CONTRIBUTE TO ADDRESSINGCHALLENGES RESULTING FROM THE COVID 19 PANDEMIC
